    • Method Detail

      • checkFileAndGetIndex

        public static void checkFileAndGetIndex()
        Checks if the file to be saved has been started already. If so, reads all pieces from the save file to the downloaded file array by verifying its SHA-1 hash. Returns the index of the piece to resume download

      • verifySHA1

        public static boolean verifySHA1(byte[] piece,
                                 int count)
        Obtains a specific piece and verifies its SHA-1 hash value.
        Parameters:
        piece -
        count -
        Returns:
        True if SHA-1 is verified. False otherwise.

      • createHandshake

        public static byte[] createHandshake()
        Creates a handshake to send to the peer
        Returns:
        byte[] of handshake message
